title._content: [Portrait of Buddy Rich, Stanley Fishelson, Tommy Allison, Phil Gilbert, Bill Howell, Mario Daone, Bob Ascher, Chunky Koenigsberg, Eddie Caine, Jerry Thirkeld, Allen Eager, Mickey Rich, Harvey Levine, H. (Harvey) Leonard, Gene Dell, Tubby Phillips, and St

description._content: Gottlieb, William P., 1917-, photographer. [Portrait of Buddy Rich, Stanley Fishelson, Tommy Allison, Phil Gilbert, Bill Howell, Mario Daone, Bob Ascher, Chunky Koenigsberg, Eddie Caine, Jerry Thirkeld, Allen Eager, Mickey Rich, Harvey Levine, H. (Harvey) Leonard, Gene Dell, Tubby Phillips, and Sta] 1 negative : b&w ; 3 1/4 x 4 1/4 in. Caption from Down Beat: Rich Band Notes: Gottlieb Collection Assignment No. 117 Reference print available in Music Division, Library of Congress. Purchase William P. Gottlieb Forms part of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (Library of Congress). In: "Buddy Rich forgets his drums; leads a new, sweeter band," Down Beat, v. 14, no. 11 (May 21, 1947), p. 14. Subjects: Rich, Buddy, 1917- Fishelson, Stanley Allison, Tommy Gilbert, Phil Howell, Bill Daone, Mario Ascher, Bob Koenigsberg, Chunky Caine, Eddie Thirkeld, Jerry Eager, Allen Rich, Mickey Levine, Harvey Leonard, H. (Harvey) Dell, Gene Phillips, Tubby Kay, Stanley Buddy Rich Band Jazz musicians--1940-1950. Big bands--1940-1950. Drummers (Musicians)--1940-1950. Conductors (Music)--1940-1950. Arcadia Ballroom Format: Portrait photographs--1940-1950. Cityscape photographs--1940-1950. Film negatives--1940-1950. Rights Info: Mr. Gottlieb has dedicated these works to the public domain, but rights of privacy and publicity may apply. lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-copyrig... Repository: (negative) Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print (contact print) Library of Congress, Prints & Photographs Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, hdl.loc.gov/loc.pnp/pp.print (reference print) Library of Congress, Music Division, Washington D.C. 20540 USA, loc.gov/rr/perform/ Part Of: William P. Gottlieb Collection (DLC) 99-401005 General information about the Gottlieb Collection is available at lcweb2.loc.gov/diglib/ihas/html/gottlieb/gottlieb-home.html Persistent URL: hdl.loc.gov/loc.music/gottlieb.07391 Call Number: LC-GLB23- 0739
